amendatorysection.catchline: Specialty level burn or pediatric trauma center, defined.
amendatorysection.para: Specialty level burn or pediatric trauma center means a trauma center that (1) provides specialized care in the areas of burns or pediatrics, (2) provides continuous accessibility regardless of day, season, or patient's ability to pay, and (3) has entry access from each of the designation levels as its online physician or qualified physician surrogate deems appropriate.
